channel.title: Mystery on silas mcnutt
channel.description: Recent content in Mystery on silas mcnutt

item.title: Movie Review: Righteous Kill (2008)
item.description: Righteous Kill (2008) - Link to heading Follow me on Letterboxd! To be honest, I feel like everyone is a little tough on Righteous Kill. Was the movie great? No. But dropping 0.5 or 1 star ratings on this bad boy like it’s Diary of A Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul is just an outright crime. Look, I get it. Throwing De Niro and Pacino into a film together and it coming out undercooked is something that saddens me as well, but to act like this movie had nothing to take off on is just harsh.

item.title: Movie Review: The Thing (1982)
item.description: The Thing (1982) - Link to heading Follow me on Letterboxd! Where do I even begin with this movie? The Thing was fantastic. I had high expectations going in, knowing the reputation this film has built for itself, and it didn’t disappoint. This is a true horror film. It doesn’t rely on cheap jumpscares or poor decision making by the characters. The Thing is something that can be beat, albeit not easily, which makes the ending not nearly as predictable as some other horror films where the antagonist is quite literally immortal.
